description: The new and improved KÜHL KOLLUSION™ Fleece Lined Men’s Jacket delivers rugged outdoor performance with sophistication and style. The tough, wax-coated exterior slices through wind and water while luxuriously soft, high-pile Italian fleece supplies superior warmth and comfort. An intuitive design strategically adds stretch, breathability, and toughness where you need it most.
name: Kuhl Kollusion Fleece Lined - Mens
